00017 bool SACMethodLMeDS::computeModel(){
00018         // Warn and exit if no threshold was set
00019         if (this->threshold == -1)
00020         {
00021                 cout<<"[LMeDS::computeModel] No threshold set!"<<endl;
00022                 return (false);
00023         }
00024 
00025         this->iterations = 0;
00026         double d_best_penalty = DBL_MAX;
00027 
00028         std::vector<int> bestModelInliersFound;
00029         std::vector<int> selection;
00030         Eigen::VectorXd estimatedModelCoefficients;
00031         std::vector<double> distances;
00032 
00033         int noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00034 
00035         // Iterate
00036         while (this->iterations < this->maxIterations)
00037         {
00038                //Compute a random model from the input pointcloud
00039                bool isDegenerate = false;
00040                bool modelFound = false;
00041 
00042                this->objectModel->computeRandomModel(this->iterations,estimatedModelCoefficients,isDegenerate,modelFound);
00043 
00044                if (!isDegenerate) break;
00045 
00046                if(!modelFound){
00047                    this->iterations++;
00048                    continue;
00049                }
00050 
00051                 double currentModelDistancePenalty = 0;
00052 
00053 
00054                 // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model
00055                 this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (estimatedModelCoefficients, distances);
00056                 std::sort (distances.begin (), distances.end ());
00057 
00058 
00059                 int mid = this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize() / 2;
00060 
00061                 if (this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize() % 2 == 0)
00062                         // d_cur_penalty = median (distances)
00063                         currentModelDistancePenalty = (sqrt (distances[mid-1]) + sqrt (distances[mid])) / 2;
00064                 else
00065                         currentModelDistancePenalty = sqrt (distances[mid]);
00066 
00067                 if (currentModelDistancePenalty < d_best_penalty)
00068                 {
00069                         d_best_penalty = currentModelDistancePenalty;
00070 
00071                         // Save the current model-coefficients selection as being the best so far
00072                         this->modelCoefficients = estimatedModelCoefficients;
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 this->iterations++;
00076         }
00077 
00078         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model again
00079         this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (this->modelCoefficients, distances);
00080 
00081         this->inliers.resize (distances.size ());
00082         // Get the inliers for the best model found
00083         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00084         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00085                 if (distances[i] <= this->threshold)
00086                         this->inliers[noInliersCurrentModel++] = i;
00087 
00088         // Resize the inliers vector
00089         this->inliers.resize (noInliersCurrentModel);
00090 
00091         if (this->inliers.size () == 0)
00092                 {
00093                         cout<<"[LMeDS::computeModel] Unable to find a solution!"<<endl;
00094                         return (false);
00095                 }
00096         return (true);
00097 }
00098 }
